message.body: Ahhhh Steve I might need an attorney!

I'm fine, thanks. But remember when my car was "stolen"/towed? Well I just got home from the PPA and it turns out that they don't even have that on record! The people who towed my car was a private company. Furthermore, the police department that sent the notification had no right to tow my car because of an inspection. I asked the Senior Director earlier and he said that the PPA is the one that deals with inspections and towing and I have proof that they took my car because of an inspection! He was that I should stay on top of this, keep the notice or warning, and contact an attorney.
Well I should contact the police department first, but this is so ridiculous. F-ing nightmare that hasn't ended!
Oh man. That's crazy.... Are they going to fine you?
I meant give you the money back for your fine.
The man said I should contact the department.
The fine from the department was taken away by the captain.
The issue lies in the fact that it shouldn't have happened
Yeah... But would you benefit from getting a lawyer then? If the fine was already taken away...
But I had to pay to get my car back and storage. I'm just annoyed because it seems sketchy.
Oh I saw June's post on my feed. That's so sweet! Thought it was your anniversary, but nevertheless, good job hahah! Adorable!
